title: A True Aristocrat
description: When young Cecile Vavasour is orphaned and beggared in a train accident, her fianc√©'s sister immediately opposes the marriage, on the grounds that as a pauper she is no longer worthy of him. But he is faithful, and marries her quickly so that she need not suffer want. The sister is incensed by his carelessness of her opinion and vows to wreak vengeance on the innocent young wife. Can she succeed in turning Howard against his beloved, and separating the two?
author: Mrs. Georgie Sheldon
